rows.label: qev092104_MSG0001
rows.name: Here, have a look. These are Mika and Fernand's Skells.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092104_MSG0002
rows.name: His is like yours, Camber—broken, but otherwise pretty clean.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092104_MSG0003
rows.name: That's a characteristic of the prototype weapon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092104_MSG0004
rows.name:
But look at Mika's.
It's smoking and covered in bullet holes...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092104_MSG0005
rows.name: You're right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092104_MSG0006
rows.name: Which means...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092104_JNK0010
rows.name: Conclude

rows.label: qev092104_SEL0011
rows.name: Say that Mika was attacked by an enemy.

rows.label: qev092104_JNK0020
rows.name: Guess

rows.label: qev092104_SEL0021
rows.name:
Surmise that Mika and Hannah
must have been fighting each other.

rows.label: qev092104_MSG0007
rows.name:
It has to be. The Ganglion must have
been drawn here by the explosion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092104_MSG0008
rows.name: Mika and Hannah? That's crazy![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092104_MSG0009
rows.name: I refuse to even consider that![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092104_MSG0010
rows.name: I agree. Mika wouldn't do that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092104_MSG0011
rows.name: I think the explosion drew the Ganglion's attention.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092104_MSG0012
rows.name: Those bastards![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092104_MSG0013
rows.name:
The girls had two damaged Skells,
which would have made them easy prey.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092104_MSG0014
rows.name: So Mika's Skell was destroyed, and Hannah—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092104_MSG0015
rows.name: Shh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092104_MSG0016
rows.name: What's wrong?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092104_MSG0017
rows.name: It's a Ganglion Skell. No, more than one. Moving slow.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092104_MSG0018
rows.name: How do you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092104_MSG0019
rows.name: I can hear them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092104_MSG0020
rows.name: You know enemy Skells by their sound? You ARE obsessed![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092104_MSG0021
rows.name: STAY BACK![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092104_MSG0022
rows.name: Mika?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092104_MSG0023
rows.name: She's still alive![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092104_MSG0024
rows.name: We have to help her![ST:wait ]
